post:
Hello,

SemoWeb LLC has officially launched its budget vps in Los Angeles California due to clients demand, we believe this location is a perfect fit for many people and due to the demand and popularity we have launched very powerful nodes in Hardware RAID-10 so that we can provide our customers with excellent Disk I/O.

SemoWeb LLC has mass mailed all of its existing clients base in regards to the recent expansion and has fulfilled many new orders across the new nodes in Los Angeles within the first few hours of launching! We are very excited about the recent expansion and know that our clients are going to continue to enjoy our 24/7 support towards our services.

768MB DDR3 -- DEDICATED RAM
1GB DDR3 -- BURSTABLE RAM
80GB -- DISKSPACE
3,000GB -- BANDWIDTH 
4x 3.20Ghz -- Four (x4) Shared Cores!
1x IPv4 -- One (x1) Dedicated IP!
Location: Los Angeles --> One Wilshire
NO price increases -- Lock your self in!
RAID-10 Nodes -- Excellent Disk I/O

TEST IP: 198.136.57.130

DISCOUNTED TOTAL: $5.99/Month $0.00 Setup fee 

Order now link: <a href="https://www.semoweb.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=159" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">https://www.semoweb.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=159</a></p>
